text:
Part 2 of previous Tomas Pueyo #coronavirus article. Wear masks, wash hands, don't talk, don't crowd. When should we stop listening to #TheWHO and start listening to Mr Pueyo regarding mask wearing advice? Masks are already compulsory in many countries.

https://t.co/jPRCvHxsx4
